question: What is the IUCN status of Seychelles sheath-tailed bat?
explanation: The IUCN status of Seychelles sheath-tailed bat is Critically Endangered. It is a sac-winged bat which is found in the central granitic islands of the Seychelles. It is an insectivorous bat which feeds primarily in forest clearings at night and roosting in communal roosts by day.
